Some food for thought. Before the Winter Break I attended a few sessions at my local Womenâ€™s Circle as a form of mindfulness and wellbeing practice. The circle involves some breathing exercises, guided meditation, reflection time and opportunities to share thoughts and perspectives on various different topics/themes. It sometimes includes some journaling time based on a particular prompt too. At the end of the session each person picks a card and reads the message or affirmation on it. Thought Iâ€™d share mine here for anyone who might find the message meaningful.
